casebody.data:
Second Department,

July, 1956

(July 2, 1956) Virginia Connolly et al., Respondents-Appellants, v. Lutheran Hospital of Brooklyn, Appellant-Respondent. Leo J. Erdil, Appellant, et al., Respondent.

Motion by defendant-appellant for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division denied, without costs. Present—Wenzel, Acting P. J., Beldock, Murphy, TJghetta and Kleinfeld, JJ.
